welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dumont, where small town charm meets big city adventures! Known for its stunning natural scenery and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Air Canada, American Airlines, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 30 minutes after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all major airlines and serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is reserved for private and corporate jets.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at JFK, primarily serving international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal at JFK, serving many international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves JetBlue Airways and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves British Airways, Alaska Airlines, and many other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing exclusive services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's wifi network for free with a provided password.
